module.name: OSS PBX End Point Manager
module.description: OSS PBX End Point Manager is the free supported PBX Endpoint Manager for FreePBX. It is NOT to be confused with the commercial version called 'endpoint'. The main differences between the two versions is that the developer of Commercial Endpoint works 30 hours a week paid by Schmoozecom to work on it.
module.changelog: *2.11.4.11* Fixes #6426 (Fatal SQL error - Device cfg submit with apostrophe in extn text description) *2.11.4.10* Fixes #6428 *2.11.4.9* Fix a stupid error on my part with requiring php 5.3 SORRY! :-( *2.XX.X.X* https://github.com/tm1000/freepbx-endpointmanager/commits/master
